entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this morning then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
